translation: Having attained Me, these great souls do not take birth again here—a place of pain and impermanence—but have reached the highest perfection of liberation.
commentary: 8.15 Me to Me? Upetya having attained? Rebirth rirth? Dukhalaya the place of pain? Eternal noneternal? Not not? get get? Mahatmas Mahatmas or the great souls? sansiddhim to perfection? The highest highest? Gataḥ having reached.Commentary Birth is the home of pain or seat of sorrow arising from the body. Study the Garbhopanishad.
